required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective Analysis of Morbi-mortality of Patients With Cancers in Active Phase of Treatment Suspected or Diagnosed of a SARS-CoV-2 Infection
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Analysis of Morbi-mortality of Patients With Cancers in Active Phase of Treatment Suspected or Diagnosed of a SARS-CoV-2 Infection

brief_summary.textblock: National multicentre epidemiological study to describe retrospectively and prospectively the clinical outcomes of patients with a suspected coronavirus infection (either confirmed or not) while receiving a medical treatment for the underlying cancer

primary_outcome.measure: Mortality of cancer patients under active anticancer treatment
primary_outcome.time_frame: 28 days after the date of the diagnostic procedure
primary_outcome.description: Mortality rate, defined as the proportion of patients who are dead 28 days after the date of the diagnostic procedure for the 2 cohorts of patients (positive and negative).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months (i.e. at the the time of last patient last visit)
secondary_outcome.description: Overall survival will be defined as the time from the date of the first diagnostic procedure (either diagnostic test or chest imaging) to the date of death due to any cause.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 28 days after the date of the diagnostic procedure
secondary_outcome.description: The duration of hospitalization (from the date of hospitalization to the date of definitive discharge for live patients)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months (i.e. at the the time of last patient last visit)
secondary_outcome.description: Cause of death, related or not to the COVID-19

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 28 days after the date of the diagnostic procedure
secondary_outcome.description: Associated complications described by their type

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 28 days after the date of the diagnostic procedure
At the date of the diagnostic procedure
secondary_outcome.description: To describe accurately patients' characteristics in terms of demographics

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the date of the diagnostic procedure
secondary_outcome.description: To describe accurately patients' characteristics in type of tumor

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the date of the diagnostic procedure
secondary_outcome.description: To describe accurately patients' characteristics in type of anticancer treatment,

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the date of the diagnostic procedure
secondary_outcome.description: To describe accurately patients' characteristics in terms of comorbidities

study_pop.textblock: Patients with cancer in active phase of treatment suspected or diagnosed of a SARS-CoV-2 infection

facility.name: Institut Universitaire du Cancer de Toulouse - IUCT Oncopole
